It's been 10 years (11y when 10 oct comes) since the game was release. I still remember the first time I played it when i'm still a little "shiz" .... but it's still a great FPS game all over the time. Right now i'm a first year of university AND STILL WAITING. HL3 may be never come but don't never lose your hope ( I guess) .

Lemme smash please 
Give us some Half-Life 3

I'm sorry my brothers, I have failed.

I played Half-life 2 and both episodes, now i will be waiting in vain for HL3 forever.

Eli implies that he wants Gordon and Alyx to have sex because the suppression field is down
"Can you blame an old man for wantin' grandkids?"

Gordon was 27 at the time of the Black Mesa Incident. 20 years have passed since the event, making him technically 47 years old.
Alyx was about 3-4 years old during the BMI, and is now about 23-24.
A true citizen waits for half-life 3

This game is such an amazing last breath of Half-Life for all of us to enjoy. Now in 2018, it looks like HL2:E3 is never going to happen, or that it's not planned in any foreseeable future, and that's a shame, but that doesn't change the fact that the HL games that already came out are fantastic. This series has proven to be one of my favorite. I love the new elements they introduced into this game, and the story shocked me at two big points (I won't spoil which). This game is also beautiful and it gave my computer the hardest time running of all of the HL games. I just had to turn down the graphics at a few points as it tried to render too many large enemies and NPC's at once. If you have a stronger PC than mine (which shouldn't be too hard), then it should run well and look awesome, I would have to guess. I will wait for a sequel if and whenever it comes. In the meantime, I'm going to replay through all of the HL2 games again on a harder difficulty. Cheers.

Recuerdo que un sabio amigo me dijo un d√≠a: "Si no has jugado la saga Half Life, mejor que no lo hagas, o te pasar√°s toda tu vida pensando en por qu√© nunca sucedi√≥".

Ya conoc√≠a de antes el meme de Half Life 3 confirmed, pero quer√≠a vivirlo en mis carnes. Error. No ha pasado un solo d√≠a desde que termin√© el maldito Episodio 2 que no haya buscado alguna referencia al n√∫mero 3, un atisbo de esperanza, algo, aunque fuese alg√∫n troleo de nuestro amado y odiado Gaben.

Ahora hablando enserio, si contextualizamos la saga de Half Life 2 en la √©poca que se public√≥, f√°cilmente podr√≠amos decir que es una de las mejores sagas de videojuegos de la historia, adem√°s de, ser el precursor y padre de su g√©nero, no tiene absolutamente nada que envidiarle a muchos de los juegos actuales de su g√©nero. Las animaciones faciales de los personajes, las f√≠sicas, la ambientaci√≥n, la banda sonora, y sobre todo, el maravilloso gui√≥n que ha dado pie a miles de teor√≠as en los foros... Es un juego que puedes jugar perfectamente a d√≠a de hoy sin sentir el sistem√°tico rechazo que sentimos algunos j√≥venes cuando jugamos un videojuego antiguo (a m√≠ si me pasa, cosas de millennials). Vamos, que ha envejecido cojonudamente.

Si es verdad que la mec√°nica de juego puede llegar a ser tediosa y repetitiva. Ir desde un punto A a un punto B de forma un poco lineal, matando todo lo que se cruce por delante, encontrando de vez en cuando alg√∫n puzle facil√≥n que parece puesto a prop√≥sito para sacar a relucir las f√≠sicas del motor Source, aunque esto √∫ltimo se hace m√°s ameno cuando est√°s deseando seguir adelante para ver qu√© demonios va a suceder. Otra vez m√°s, maravillas del gui√≥n.

Evidentemente, soy otro fanboy m√°s que espera llegar a ver el n√∫mero 3 de manera oficial, aunque, a d√≠a de hoy, lo dudo bastante. Por mucho que nos duela, El juego es de Valve, y se lo f*lla cuando quiere, si Gaben no quiere ni mencionar "Ricochet 2", est√° en su derecho, pero no me parece nada justo lo que han hecho con esta saga, y mucho menos con la comunidad, a la que ha estado mareando desde pr√°cticamente desde 2008 con la supuesta salida del Episodio 3, y a la que le debe tant√≠simo.

Si, si que os recomiendo a todos los que no hay√°is jugado nunca la saga que le deis una oportunidad, (el dislike es por resentimiento puro), pero avisados est√°is, preparaos para tener una astilla clavada de por vida, o una barra de metal...

(REVIEW CONTAINS STORY SPOILERS!)I so badly do not want to recommend this. Not because this game itself is bad, the game is fantastic and a great continuation of the story. But the ending is the most depressing shit I have ever seen. Now, the ending itself I can manage. The fact that there is no Half Life 3 makes it unbearable. The last thing of the Half Life franchise is Eli dying and Alyx crying. It's completely unacceptable to leave this franchise as it is and leave everybody depressed when we were so close to the end. Yet Valve ceases to care. I love this game and its franchise but the ending is piss poor on this and I recommend for fun game play but you may not want to play till the end and leave it on a good note. Valve WTF where is Half Life 3?

Lo mejor de este episodio es que ahora estamos fuera (al fin) de la ciudad 17,ya que los escenarios empezaban a repetirse demasiado,hay  muchas batallas epicas con una duraci√≥n general aceptable si eres de los que completan los logros, he tenido un par de momentos donde parece que falla la IA y los personajes se quedan parados en el lugar,pero despues se arregla a medida que avanzo.
Me encanta lo distintos que son los escenarios de los HL anteriores,las cuevas de las hormigas leon, white forest,las batallas con los vortigaunts,tambien el cambio en la interfaz era necesario.

L√°stima que la continuaci√≥n de esta historia ,ya sea en forma de HL2 ep 3 o  HL3 ,nunca va a salir ya que las sagas mas importantes de valve fueron abandonadas,me refiero tambien a Portal y Left 4 Dead.
Good game but screw valve for that ending I wanted the game to end quickly but not like that. Good game but a little disappointed that I played it only because of the gigantic cliff hanger ending.

Je joue sur Linux. Version Linux : excellente.

[h1]Le jeu[/h1]

La suite de l'√©pisode 1. Niveau r√©alisation et gameplay, c'est pareil que HL2, rien √† redire. Un plus pour les d√©cors, nettement plus sympas que ceux de HL2:EP1.

L'histoire ne se "termine" pas, on peut donc attendre une suite.

[h1]Rejouabilit√©, achievements[/h1]

Aucun probl√®me pour les achievements.

[h1]En bref[/h1]

La suite de l'histoire de HL2:EP1. Recommand√© !

[h1]GNU/Linux[/h1]

La version Linux est excellente. Je n'ai rencontr√© aucun probl√®me et le jeu tourne au poil sur ma machine.

OS: Linux Mint 16 x64, MATE edition.
Hardware : i5 3570K OC@4.5Ghz, Nvidia 670GTX, 16GB ram.
Screens : Triplescreen, dont un vertical, configur√©s en screens X s√©par√©s.

10/10 game best game ever created but why is there no episode 3 the game ended in a way that you would expect another game there was no gman so there has to be more

Most perfect conclusion for HF2.
Very enjoyable part, a lot more uplifting that Episode One. New environment, forest and cabins are much refreshing to the most used to citadel rubble. More in depth look into the story and the characters, with few new enemies and entities to see. If you wonder why there such hype, and why is everybody awaiting the Half Life 3, to know that you should play this conclusive part along with all others.

So it's been over a decade since the release of this game and yet there is no offical continuation oof the story? Great game but please, learn how to count to three.

Wow. This was great, the level design, the new Hunters, and the new vehicles are also really great.  It runs really well on even the worst of potato computers, and you don't need to be a pro to play it. Its sad Episode 3 won't be coming out, but at least we got some closure from the story page.

I miss this game so much, I miss how excited the community would get over a release from valvE and I miss being excited for new games... Half-Life 3 may never be released but at least this timeless masterpiece can truly go down as the number 1 FPS ever created and I won't say I'm the number one fan but damn I have so many good memories thanks to this games and spin offs... Truly sad to finially say I've lost hope in valvE, Money is all they are worried about but if there is one thing you should buy its this game and all of the other half-lifes.
